quotes.perfect: You two think alike. That's rare. Don't take it for granted.
quotes.great: You're on the same wavelength. That's the foundation of something real.
quotes.good: You get each other. That's more than most people ever find.
quotes.midHigh: You've got enough in common to build on. The rest is up to you.
quotes.mid: You're different, but that can work. If you want it to.
quotes.midLow: You don't see eye to eye on much. That's okay. Opposites exist for a reason.
quotes.low: You're pretty different. That's fine. Sometimes that's exactly what works.
quotes.veryLow: You're pretty different. That's fine. Sometimes that's exactly what works.
